TopicTitle: Glitch with jet engines in water

Articles.Content:
![C88C0AACD41FFD1570F4805DF10612AA3902CD85](http://images.akamai.steamusercontent.com/ugc/443951153481496489/C88C0AACD41FFD1570F4805DF10612AA3902CD85/)

Decided to take my science rover into the drink and much to my surprise I got some very strange graphical issues.

![31530CEC929574EF53007A8C7D28319F4E1A4BA5](http://images.akamai.steamusercontent.com/ugc/443951153481496939/31530CEC929574EF53007A8C7D28319F4E1A4BA5/)

The way the launch effects moved across the surface of the water made for a nausea inducing experience. Even at full throttle I couldn't get over 5 or so meters per second not sure if the unretractable gear sticking out was responsible for that or water viscosity is now the same as tar.

KSP v1.0.3 via Steam
